content.en: Spam filtering advancements: Researchers have investigated various machine learning algorithms to improve spam filtering. These algorithms include support vector machines, AdaBoost, maximum entropy model, relevance vector machine, and extreme learning machine. Additionally, feature selection methods such as particle swarm optimization, binomial hypothesis testing, and artificial neural networks have been used to enhance spam detection. The combination of natural language processing, machine learning, and swarm intelligence has also been explored to develop more effective spam email filtering systems.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for spamfiltrering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige maskinlæringsalgoritmer for at forbedre spamfiltrering. Disse algoritmer inkluderer support vector machines, AdaBoost, maximum entropy model, relevance vector machine og extreme learning machine. Derudover er funktionsudvælgelsesmetoder som particle swarm optimization, binomial hypoteseprøvning og kunstige neurale netværk blevet brugt til at forbedre spamdetektering. Kombinationen af naturlig sprogbehandling, maskinlæring og sværmintelligens er også blevet udforsket for at udvikle mere effektive spamfilteringssystemer til e-mails.
